name: Dreamcatcher (itch) (WombatBat)
description:
F1 - Restart Level

ESC - Menu

Dreamcatcher is a relaxing puzzle game, where you can try to create a beautiful dreamcatcher by yourself.

You have to make connections in an area of the right colour and avoid the black areas.  If you make a connection in a black area, the level restarts.

We wish you good luck!
